ygData.subject: RE: What is a PvP zone?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... this still wont unstick songs for me from the mask of the deciever bug. i can stop the song with /st but not if its bugged by the mask. only way to get
ygData.messageBody:
At 01:04 PM 9/1/99 -0400, you wrote:
>From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>
>
>there is now a way to unstick songs without clicking super fast.
>
>/st
>
>it will stop whatever song you are playing.
>
>Shada D'ukal, Level 50 Wood Elf Bard
>Erisi Dlarit, Level 21 High Elf Paladin
>Tyria, Level 10 High Elf Wizard
>Mithaniel Marr Server
>
>

this still wont unstick songs for me from the mask of the deciever bug. i
can stop the song with /st but not if its bugged by the mask. only way to
get unstuck currently is your orginaly suggestion of wacking it many times fast
